content_markdown:
# Unshakeable Faith
## Scripture
"He kept him as the apple of his eye, like an eagle that stirs up its nest, that it may spread its wings, take flight, and so be carried on the updrafts." â€“ Deuteronomy 32:11

## Reflection
As men, we often face challenges that test our faith. We may feel like we're being tossed about like waves on a stormy sea. But God's Word reminds us that He is our Rock, our Shield, and our Refuge. Just like an eagle stirs up its nest to prepare its young for flight, God is constantly stirring up our hearts to prepare us for the battles ahead. He desires us to soar on the updrafts of His love and provision. When the winds of adversity blow, we can trust that our faith is unshakeable, rooted in the solid foundation of God's promises.

## Daily Challenge
"Walk 10 steps while declaring your trust in God's sovereignty."
